title: (Fri Early Bird) We Play Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Lunchbox Doesn't Act Like A Celebrity
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) We Play Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Lunchbox Doesn't Act Like A Celebrity
description:
We start the weekend off by playing Easy Trivia! We go around the room and answer easy questions and see if Lunchbox can remain the champion. Plus, it's Fun Fact Friday! We learn some fun new facts and give our input. We open the mailbag and answer a listener's question about why Lunchbox always acts so crazy in front of celebrities. We hear his explanation and which celebrities he has been star-struck being around.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
